thread.title: FBI used aerial surveillance above Ferguson
thread.title_full: FBI used aerial surveillance above Ferguson - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: FBI used aerial surveillance above Ferguson
text: WASHINGTON (AP) â€” FBI Director Jim Comey says the agency used its aircraft above Ferguson, Missouri, last year to help local law enforcement keep track of unrest on the ground. [...] in response to questioning, he did say that the FBI uses airplanes during investigations of specific suspects in criminal, terrorism and espionage investigations and to help local police during emergencies. > ...
